intro.p: The DataBind Attribute is used to indicate that an Action methods parameter is to be intercepted and handled by the Castle.Components.Binder.DataBinder.

note.p: Allowed usage is one per method parameter, and is not inherited.

section.title: DataBindAttribute(System.String prefix)
section.p: Creates a Castle.MonoRail.Framework.DataBindAttribute with an associated prefix. The prefix must be present in the form data and is used to avoid name clashes.

tr.td: Gets or sets the property names to exclude.
Gets or sets the property names to allow.
Gets or sets Castle.MonoRail.Framework.ParamStore used to indicate where to get the values from

section.title: Bind(Castle.MonoRail.Framework.SmartDispatcherController controller, System.Reflection.ParameterInfo parameterInfo) : System.Object
section.p: Implementation of Castle.MonoRail.Framework.IParameterBinder.Bind(Castle.MonoRail.Framework.SmartDispatcherController,System.Reflection.ParameterInfo) and it is used to read the data available and construct the parameter type accordingly.

section.title: CalculateParamPoints(Castle.MonoRail.Framework.SmartDispatcherController controller, System.Reflection.ParameterInfo parameterInfo) : System.Int32
section.p: Implementation of Castle.MonoRail.Framework.IParameterBinder.CalculateParamPoints(Castle.MonoRail.Framework.SmartDispatcherController,System.Reflection.ParameterInfo) and it is used to give the method a weight when overloads are available.
